# TASK::SET_TASK_MOVE_NETWORK_ENABLE_COLLISION_ON_NETWORK_CLONE_WHEN_FIXED

## Summary
Enables collision on network clones when local player ped is fixed

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **BOOL** enableCollisionOnNetworkCloneWhenFixed

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Doesn't actually return anything.
